Project Name: Minasian (Caro) Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts
Title: Majmūʿah
Description.tableOfContents:
Title: Sharḥ Dīwān al-Mutanabbī; Pp. 1-75. A commentary by an unknown author on the poetry of al-Mutanabbī including biographical notes. Mentions the works of al-Jurjānī, al-Maʿarrī, Ibn Jinnī, and Abū ʿAlī ibn Furjah and Burūjirdī. Missing end folios.

Title: Ṭarāʾif al-ṭuraf wa-ẓarāʾif al-nuṭaf; Pp. 77-174. A collection of various works of Arabic poetry. Compiler unknown. Consists of 12 chapters.
Subject: Arabic fiction
Name.repository: University of California, Los Angeles. $b Library Special Collections
Source: Caro Minasian Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts, box 3, 13
Description.citation: Muḥammad Taqī Dānish-pazhūh, Fihrist-i Nushahhā-yi khaṭṭī, daftar 11 & 12 (Ṭihrān: Intishārāt-i Dānishgāh-i Ṭihrān, 1039 AH), p. 656.
Description.note: Contents: [1] Sharḥ Dīwān al-Mutanabbī -- [2] Ṭarāʾif al-ṭuraf wa-ẓarāʾif al-nuṭaf.  Note: DP has the order of these two reversed.

Project Name: Minasian (Caro) Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts
Title: Majmūʿah
Description.tableOfContents:
Title: Chand muʿammā; Pp. 4-6. Three pages of various verses of poetry. Seems to be in the same hand as the following manuscript, Makhzan-i javāhir. Includes verses by ʿAṭāʾī, Mīr Ḥaydar, Faṣīḥ, Mīrzā Jān, Jamshīd, Nizām-i Āstarābādī, and Kamāl Ṭabīb. Compiler is unknown.

Title: Makhzan-i jawāhir; Pp. 7-17. Riddles.

Title: Muʿammā-yi Mullā Shihāb Ḥaqīrī; Pp. 29-39. Author is unknown.

Title: Muʿammiyāt-i Mīr Ḥaydar Rafīʿī; Pp. 43-72. Author is unknown.

Title: Muʿammiyāt-i Jāmī va dīgarān; Pp. 75-86. Riddles.

Title: Sharḥ al-Fuṣūṣ li-Ibn al-ʿArabī; Pp. 90-211. A commentary on Ibn ʿArabī's mystical work. The beginning and end folios are missing and there are three pages inserted between Makhzan-i Javāhir and Muʿammā-yi Mullā Shihāb Ḥaqīrī (pp. 20-27). Includes notes in the margins. Author is unknown.
Name.repository: University of California, Los Angeles. $b Library Special Collections
Source: Caro Minasian Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts, box 3, 23
